summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 5, Heirs of Sarah A. Bell's Addition, being the alley between 7th Avenue and 8th Avenue, from Olive Way to Stewart Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14183 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
